Name: Commitment to achieve certain reductions in greenhouse gas emissions by 2050.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the commitment to achieve certain reductions in greenhouse gas emissions by 2050

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Scheduled by Mayor
History.MinutesNote: This bill did not have a hearing on this date since the scheduled and noticed Mayoral Public Hearing of April 24, 2019 was not held.

History.Description: This Introduction was City Charter Rule Adopted
This Introduction was Returned Unsigned by Mayor

Summary: This bill would establish the Office of Building Energy and Emissions Performance as well as greenhouse gas emissions limits for existing buildings.
